Title:
Taxonomy and phylogeny of the genus Megasporoporia with
descriptions of six new species
Abstract:
The phylogeny of Megasporoporia was studied using
molecular data from nLSU and ITS. Separate datasets for nLSU and ITS
were analyzed, the results showed that Megasporoporia was polyphyletic,
forming four clades in the core polyporoid clade. Based on morphological
and phylogenetic results, six new species: M. bannaensis, M.
guangdongensis, M. hengduanensis, M. lacerata, M. minor and M.
pseudocavernulosa were described from China. A key to the worldwide
species of Megasporoporia is provided.
